history.proof: intros. destruct H as [H_group [H_assoc [H_neutral H_opp]]]. sfirstorder depth: 3use: is_group, opposite, neutral, opp_unicity, intern.

exceptions.tactic: unfold is_group, Opp, opposite, neutral, intern in *.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce Opp to an evaluable reference.
Cannot coerce Opp to an evaluable reference.

In environment S : Set G : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S O : S Opp : S -> S H_group : intern S G Add H_assoc : associativity S Add H_neutral : neutral S G Add O H_opp : opposite S G Add O Opp Unable to unify "?M1393 = Opp ?M1392" with "Opp O = O".

original: intros. unfold is_group, Opp, opposite, neutral, intern in *. destruct H as [H_group [H_assoc [H_neutral H_opp]]]. unfold Opp in *. apply opp_unicity; auto.
